scene.text: It's five in the morning.
Inside a large device, a girl fastens her seat belt and turns on the power.
Above the power button is a badge: a string of Russian letters surrounding a rocket.
ИНТЕРКОСМОС (INTERKOSMOS)
Nearly half a century ago, with the help of Schicksal, humans successfully sent several astronauts from different countries to the moon.
This machine is part of the legacy of that glorious era.
scene.speak: Warm up complete.
Current analog magnification，0.2.
Starting operation.
scene.text: ᴳᵀ Accompanied by a noise and the scent of oil from the ancient machinery, from the waist of the girl, the air pressurization system began to balance the gravity of the earth for her.
ᴳᵀ Now, her ankles and knees only need to bear 20% of the weight-
This way, the girl is able to run for dozens of kilometres without risking damage and stress to her joints.
The sun rises early.
Valkyrie Durandal begins a new day of training.

scene.speak: ᴳᵀ Average heart rate is 125... Very good, and the workout is good too.
ᴳᵀ So Bianka-sama, will you have your breakfast?
ᴳᵀ Today's dessert is freshly baked cheese Napoleon.

remark.p: ᴳᵀ Mille-feuille is a type of cake made from three layers of meringue with two layers of cream or jam. The inspiration for its invention may come from a pizza in Naples.

ᴳᵀ Due to the similar spelling of "Napolitain" (the adjective form of "Naples") and "Napoleon" ("Napoleon"), this dessert was nicknamed "Napoleon" in English; Chinese also translated it as "Napoleon Cake".
ᴳᵀ P.S. Due to the relationship between the Russo-French War of 1812, "Napoleon" is one of the most popular cake styles in Russia.

scene.speak: ᴳᵀ Huh? Rita? Why did you suddenly think of doing this kind of favor today?
ᴳᵀ --and many more.
ᴳᵀ Just now, you called me... "Bianka"?
ᴳᵀ Eh, hehe. That's right.
ᴳᵀ Because today is a special day worth remembering with a cake.
ᴳᵀ Today? February 28 ... No, 29?
ᴳᵀ What.
ᴳᵀ Has it been four years?
ᴳᵀ It's good to know you... Or rather, to know them.
ᴳᵀ ……Even if I myself have become accustomed to the name "Durandal".
ᴳᵀ ……
ᴳᵀ The Overseer will choose the opportunity to implement his plan.
ᴳᵀ And we will eventually have the opportunity to honor our promises.
ᴳᵀ ……Of course.
ᴳᵀ That was the top priority of the girl Bianka.

scene.text: In the archives of Schicksal, a stack of now yellowed paper lay quietly.
This declassified document begins with——
Top secret mission： "LONELY PANTHALASSA"
Start date: February 29th 2012
Location: ██████████ - The Sea of Quanta
Members: Bianka "Durandal" Ataegina (12), Rita Rossweisse (16)
Status: Closed
Reviewed by: Otto Apocalypse
Yes.
This story will now go back in time 1,461 days before February 29th, 2016——
To the moment when Bianka Ataegina and Rita Rossweisse arrived in the Sea of Quanta.

scene.speak: Gosh, these refugees are nothing but cowards!
They're all the same no matter the era they came from!
Can you believe they would prefer to live in hunger rather than help us sail on the sea!?
How spineless can someone be!?
Well, before they drifted here they didn't have any sailing experience...
...It's natural they would be afraid of the mythical sea monster "Leviathan".
What—— Are you saying it's okay for them to never leave this island? It's okay for them to keep living only picking up shells and catching crabs?
There is a saying that goes "The boat should be near the coast".
...What?
Bianka-sama, the "average person" is pessimistic and realistic. Before they even start considering the rewards of their success, they look at the consequences of their failure.
If a person like that is put against the sea, a completely unknown world to them—— They won't be able to fight back against their fears.
The name "Leviathan"...
Makes them subconsciously believe that sailing to the sea is equal to becoming an enemy of nature itself——
——In other words, they are committing suicide.
Thus, from their perspective, we are naive "crazy adventurers".
Hm. Sympathizing with the weak?
Also——
——Rita, how many times have I told you today?
Stop adding "-sama" to my name... It's creepy.
I'm a Valkyrie who only met you right before this mission started, and you only became my adjutant due to a certain someone's insistence.
——Please stop talking to me the same way you talk to the Overseer!
Understood, Bianka-sama.
Excuse me.
You two... Are you perhaps new here?
...Yes.
We've been here for 38 minutes and 25 seconds—— No, 26 seconds now.
However, unlike you all, we've come here to *explore* rather than to *escape*.
Needless to say, until our mission is completed—— We plan to involve ourselves in all your joys and sorrows.
I am Bianka Ataegina, and this my adjutant, Rita Rossweisse—— How can we help you?
Hahahaha!
Ahahahaha!
...What's so funny?
My apologies! We the elderly just like to laugh. Please don't mind it, miss explorer.
Anyway——
I heard you two are trying to gather forces to defeat the "Leviathan" and open the way to the ocean.
Yes, that's correct.
Not a single person wanted to fight together with us though!
Haha... Understandable. None of them are warriors——
——They can't be compared with heroes who have seen hell itself.
How do you know that...
Hahaha, when you get to my age you can tell just by looking at someone's eyes!
I'm Miguel. Let me get straight to the point——
Brave warriors... Would you embark on an epic hunt together with this old sailor who can't even move his left hand?
What?
You mean...
In short, I'll provide you with a ship and take care of steering it.
——Though all I have is a reed boat! Hahaha!
ᴳᵀ Oh, the sea, my old friend!
ᴳᵀ Thank you for raising your hand so that this moldy old broken ship has not fallen apart today!
ᴳᵀ ……What's wrong, suddenly the poems are booming.
ᴳᵀ Hahaha ... Look, this reed boat has been eating ash for three years, but it is still so strong!
ᴳᵀ ……Has "Leviathan" been besieging the island for so long?
ᴳᵀ Well, maybe even longer. In short, it seemed to have built a nest near here and refused to leave.
ᴳᵀ Ugh. When we arrived here in the first year, we were able to catch a lot of good fish!
ᴳᵀ ……At that time, did you find any other islands around?
ᴳᵀ Well, no.
ᴳᵀ No other land can be seen here-without sufficient preparation, even Columbus would not dare to set sail lightly.
ᴳᵀ ……Does it mean fresh water and dry food?
ᴳᵀ Well, those of course are also essential--
ᴳᵀ -But the point is that you need a "strong" ship.
ᴳᵀ Keel! Spinnakers and square sails! These are the most important.
ᴳᵀ A boat like this canoe? No way. This is not the calm Pacific.
ᴳᵀ However, if we can get rid of "Leviathan", then there must be enough people willing to listen to our dispatch and build large ships.
ᴳᵀ Real or fake?
ᴳᵀ Haha. Humans, aren't we a species that survives by faith?
ᴳᵀ For example, the Spanish soldiers, when facing the barbarians, why do they often win with fewer soldiers?
ᴳᵀ It's not that we are really strong enough to defeat— but we let the enemy feel no hope of winning.
ᴳᵀ If not, how could only one or two hundred adventurers conquer Peru with a population of millions?
ᴳᵀ The battle of Lepanto wins less and less, it is also because everyone impressed the enemy on their feet- not the Venetian warship that relied on it.
ᴳᵀ Are you ... from the Spanish Empire?
ᴳᵀ Oh, Miss is so observant.
ᴳᵀ This is not bragging - before falling into this different world by accident, I am not only a veteran, but also a cultural person who has published several books!
ᴳᵀ Huh, listening to your breath, most of them are some unselling self-rewarding works?
ᴳᵀ Um ... I don't know if they are still popular in your four hundred years later.
ᴳᵀ "Galatea", "Birsiles and Sismonda"-
ᴳᵀ -And, "Don Quixote de La Mancha".
ᴳᵀ You……
ᴳᵀ Are you ... Cervantes?

remark.p: ᴳᵀ Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra (1547 ~ 1616) is the greatest writer in the Spanish literary world, and even Spanish is called "the language of Cervantes" ". His "Don Quixote" is considered to be the first "modern novel" in the history of literature.

ᴳᵀ Cervantes participated as an ordinary soldier in the Battle of Lepanto on October 7, 1571. In an official report written eight years later, he wrote: "... In this naval battle, Cervantes had a high fever and his condition was very poor. The company commander and his comrades told him: You are in a bad situation and should be lying in the room of the sailboat. Cervantes accused: What do you say, I have not fulfilled my obligations, rather than fearing the dead ghost, I would rather fight for the sake of God and the king ... In this way, he and his comrades-in-arms, as the company commander ordered, fought against the Turks in this battle. After the battle, General Juan knew his heroic performance and gave him four extra gold coins ... During the battle, he suffered two injuries to his chest and hands, and his left hand was crippled. "

scene.speak: Well aren't I pretty famous!
A master of literature! Hahaha, has a nice ring to it, I love it!
And here I thought you were a soldier used to the battlefield... Who could have guessed you could be this smug.
Hahahaha! How could I not be happy after hearing that! You should smile too, miss Bianka!
It'll make you more motivated once we're out in the sea!
Hmph. Your concern is unneeded. There hasn't been a single day I haven't given my everything since I've become a Valkyrie at the age of 10.
If you teach me how, I'm confident I can learn how to catch fish or steer a ship perfectly.
My my. By the way...
...Cervantes-san, how should we divide our roles once we sail?
Haha, don't be so stiff, miss. You can call me "Miguel".
That's easy.
I'll be the captain. I'll steer the ship, and judge when we should advance and retreat. As for you two——
Miss Bianka's specialty was spears, right? The harpoons are all yours.
Miss Rita is a very attentive person, so keep an eye on the anchor rope to make sure it doesn't get tangled.
Anchor rope? What is it for?
That will, of course, be used to bring the ship closer to the beast.
Can't kill it if we're too far away, right? Also, we need to pick up his body and bring it back to the island for everyone to see.
...What are we supposed to do if the "Leviathan" were to attack us? This reed boat is a little...
I'll make use of the currents to not give him the chance to attack us. It's that simple!
Oh right, didn't you two show something to the people on the island? A "gun" capable of even destroying boulders—— What was it called again...
...The all-purpose firing weapon of the previous civilization, "2nd Sacred Relic". Not a hard name to remember.
Hahahaha! We old people aren't good with long names.
But anyway, we have a weapon stronger than the cannons of the Invincible Armada——
——What we're riding on isn't an unreliable reed boat... But a merciless hunting warship!
Remember this——
"Leviathan", sea creatures, they're all just mere beasts. The only difference is their size.
——And brave hunters can't possibly be afraid of a prey they're willingly approaching themselves.
——Yeah, you get it!
Now! Let's kill him!
Look closely, old man. This is how a Valkyrie from "Schicksal" fights!
(How can he say it's a "mere beast" with such confidence?)

text.p: ᴳᵀ Although the perimeter of the island was previously measured on foot, they also observed the vantage point on the rocky mountain; however, it was not until they were in a vast ocean that the two Valkyries really felt the smallness of their "landing" spot.

ᴳᵀ The reed boat only travelled for a quarter of an hour. Behind this, the "refuge", which accommodated dozens of people, had degenerated into an indistinguishable green reef, as if it could be wiped from the sky by raising a hand.

scene.text: ᴳᵀ The midday sun shone on the surface of the sea, and the sparkling reflections stung people's eyes.
ᴳᵀ The old man gently shook his long head and stabilized the flat boat among the rolling waves.
scene.speak: Careful. He's coming.
...I don't sense anything near us.
Yeah, but it's almost time.
...Time?
After the "Leviathan" gets a whiff that someone is out in the sea, it takes him approximately 15 minutes to catch up to the ship.
I see——
——So that's why you stopped the ship here!
That's right. The reef 5 meters below the ship protects us from any attack from beneath.
After all, we're using ourselves as bait—— Being careless can be fatal.
And the opportunity to strike will only show itself for an instant——
——Wait, what's that sound!?
The sound of machinery!?
Look! There's something black under the water...!
Is that... blood?
Something is fighting the "Leviathan" under the sea!
——It's coming!
That's...
...A submarine!?
